descript_product: Toys for babies including inflatable balls
descript_descr: The withdrawal from the market includes the following models: Baby Playzone Crawl n Cruise Playground, Crawl & Slide Arcade, Ocean Wonders Aquarium, Baby Goal and 1-2-3 Tetherball. The code and date for the Ocean Wonders Aquarium are on the back of the label fixed to the mattress. The code and date for the 1-2-3 Tetherball are located on the lower part of the base. If the fourth digit of the six-digit code is 7 or less, the product is included in the withdrawal. Baby Playzone Crawl n Cruise Playground (Product 73408): For children aged six months and above. The Baby Playzone Crawl n Cruise Playground has three types of play, permitting crawling, pulling and cruising and walking inside and out. Crawl & Slide Arcade (Product B2408): For children aged nine months and above. Becomes the baby's first imaginative playground. Ocean Wonders Aquarium (Product H8094): For newborn and older babies. This is a gymnasium with two bars to which toys are attached. The gymnasium is converted into a play area to enable the child to crawl. 1-2-3 Tetherball (Product J0327): For children aged six months and above. Big inflatable ball with base light. Baby Goal (Product K0476): For children aged six months and above. Football goalposts with dismountable ball.

Suitable for children aged 3-8. Load-bearing capacity: up to 45 kg. Weight: approx. 16 kg. Battery: 6V - 10AH (POWERAKKU). Speed easily controlled using the foot switch. 5th wheel = spare wheel.
